trans-unit.source: Provides access to the main buffered graphics context object for the application domain.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso ao objeto de contexto de gráficos em buffer principal para o domínio de aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The BufferedGraphicsManager class allows you to implement custom double buffering for your graphics.
trans-unit.target: A classe BufferedGraphicsManager permite que você implemente o buffer duplo personalizado para seus elementos gráficos.

trans-unit.source: Graphics that use double buffering can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by redrawing a display surface.
trans-unit.target: Elementos gráficos que usam o buffer duplo podem reduzir ou eliminar a cintilação causado redesenhando uma superfície de exibição.

trans-unit.source: This class has one static property, <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A>, which returns the main <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe tem uma propriedade estática, <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A>, que retorna o principal <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>para o domínio de aplicativo atual.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> class creates <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> instances that can be used to draw buffered graphics.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>classe cria <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>instâncias que podem ser usadas para desenhar os elementos gráficos em buffer.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> class has no public constructor and must be created by the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object for an application domain using its <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>classe não tem construtor público e deve ser criada pelo <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>objeto para um domínio de aplicativo usando sua <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>método.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object for the current application domain from the static <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode recuperar o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>objeto para o domínio de aplicativo atual de estático <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: For more information on double buffering, see [Double Buffered Graphics](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>, and <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre buffer duplo, consulte [gráficos em buffer duplo](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>e <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"></xref> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"> </xref> para o domínio de aplicativo atual.

trans-unit.source: Within an application the Current property always returns the same <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object.
trans-unit.target: Dentro de um aplicativo atual propriedade sempre retorna o mesmo <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"></xref> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"> </xref> para o domínio de aplicativo atual.
